Posts.Content: Honestly you have all changed my bad day into good and that has taken some doing let me tell you !! What a great positive thread and thank you again . Laughed for first time in two weeks - result !!! Let's make Damn tooting sure we all complete our lists - we deserve to x
Posts.Title: When all this is over

Posts.Content: Feeling down - just browsing the conversations and this has just REALLY Cheered me up. Diagnosed on Monday. Awaiting Op and Radiotherapy. Appear to be acting like an emotion-less Zombie on outside. Inside TOTALLY different story. Head all over the place. WHEN THIS IS ALL OVER .............. 1. Get engaged to my lovely man - what a diamond he has been  2. A full back tattoo - sod the money and my age !! 3. Attack every day like its my last . No more anxiety about stupid stuff 4. Become an RSPCA volunteer - i've talked about it for years 5. Run the New York marathon 6. Eat cake when I want. Drink wine when i want
